morningJokes.joke: Why did the scarecrow win an award in the morning? Because he was outstanding in his field!
How does the sun say good morning? It rises and shines!
Why don't we tell secrets in the morning? Because they tend to spread like morning dew!
What do you call a grumpy coffee? A mean-uccino!
Why did the cereal blush in the morning? It saw the milk without its lid on!
How do you make a tissue dance in the morning? Put a little boogie in it!
Why was the math book sad in the morning? Because it had too many problems!
What did the blanket say to the bed in the morning? 'I've got you covered!'
How does a barber greet his customers in the morning? With a hair-raising 'Good morning!'
Why did the rooster cross the road in the morning? To wake up the people on the other side!
